name: Fear of the dark (CoqDeCombat)
description:
In Fear of the Dark you control a strong wizard lost in a forest and under attack by wraiths. 

Illuminate your surroundings and carefully manage your energy meter so you don't get buried in darkness.

Upgrade your abilities as the enemy hordes get stronger and see how long your energy can last and compete on online leaderboard!

Made for Ludum Dare 39.

Check out the help menu in-game to see the controls!
